alert.note: Alert for Eastern Cochise County Below 5000 Feet including Douglas, Willcox; South Central Pinal County including Eloy, Picacho Peak State Park; Tohono O'odham Nation including Sells; Upper Gila River and Aravaipa Valleys including Clifton, Safford; Upper San Pedro River Valley including Sierra Vista, Benson (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued December 24 at 6:40AM MST until December 24 at 10:00AM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Areas of visibility below 1 mile with some locations dropping below 1/4 mile in dense fog. * WHERE...Tohono O`odham Nation, South Central Pinal County, Upper San Pedro River Valley, Eastern Cochise County below 5000 feet and Upper Gila River Valley. * WHEN...Until 10 AM MST this morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
